mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, REPLY_LASTMODIFIED, NOTICE_NO, REPLY_DEPTH, REPLY_GROUP_NO, REPLY_GROUP_ORD) VALUES (REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{noticeNo}, 0, REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
